name: logalyzer-client
description: Client files for Logalyzer - Build a log analyzer for anything.

scripts.build: npm run build-components && npm run build-entities
scripts.build-components: npm run build-logalyzer-app && npm run build-main-app
scripts.build-logalyzer-app: svelte compile --format es src/Components/LogalyzerApp.html > lib/Components/LogalyzerApp.js && babel lib/Components/LogalyzerApp.js -o lib/Components/LogalyzerApp.js
scripts.build-main-app: svelte compile --format es src/Components/MainApp.html > lib/Components/MainApp.js && babel lib/Components/MainApp.js -o lib/Components/MainApp.js

author: Hunter Perrin <hperrin@gmail.com>
